attributes.action: Equalise private pensions with public sector workers
attributes.additional_details: As public sector workers' pensions are paid out of tax and are guaranteed by the government, it is only fair that private sector workers should enjoy the same  pensions benefits. A private sector worker on retirement should therefore be entitled to demand that the government guarantees equality and that private sector workers will be guaranteed the same pension as a public sector worker taking into account same salary and years of service etc.
